text:
As discussed on the dev mailing list, we would like to include a mocking framework. A short research resulted in the following candidates:

   - https://www.openhub.net/p/spock
   - https://www.openhub.net/p/jmockit
   - https://www.openhub.net/p/mockito

In order to decide which framework we want to use, each framework should be used to model a test case. As jdbc seems to be a bit under tested, it would probably be a good idea to use AbstractJDBCTestElement.java as a starting point.
